info.name: PayPal - Dark n Simple
info.description: Changes PayPal to a dark grey or grey to make it easy for the eyes at low lit areas.
info.additionalInfo: V1.4 (March 11th, 2018): â–º Fixed for new update. V1.3 (March 11th, 2018): ► Fixed payment details. ► Other minor adjustments to other pages. ► Added "Grey" theme for those who don't really like really dark websites. V1.2 (November 27th, 2017): ► Minor changes and fixes. V1.1 (April 25th, 2017): ► Themed most of the website while logged in. ► Fixed hovering over payments won't show weird line on the right. V1.0 (April 23rd, 2017): ► Initial release. This is an early build, there will be things that aren't themed Twitter YouTube Twitch Website
